name: jest-date-2
description: Custom jest matchers to test dates
author: mewben, stefanwullems <stefan@exivity.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:clean && tsc && yarn build:root && yarn build:docs
scripts.build:clean: yarn rimraf dist extend-expect.js extend-expect.d.ts matchers.js matchers.d.ts
scripts.build:root: tsc matchers.ts --noEmit false --declaration true && tsc extend-expect.ts --noEmit false --declaration true
scripts.publish:major: yarn build && npm version major && npm publish && yarn build:clean
scripts.publish:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && npm publish && yarn build:clean
scripts.publish:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && npm publish && yarn build:clean
